getParentFolderPath

@IPSJexlMethod(description="get the folder path for this item",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="itemId",description="the item GUID"))
public String getParentFolderPath(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid itemId)
                           throws com.percussion.webservices.PSErrorException,
                                  com.percussion.extension.PSExtensionProcessingException,
                                  com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Get the folder path for an item.

Parameters:
itemId - the GUID for the item
Returns:
the parent folder path. If there are multiple paths, the first one will be returned. Will be null if the item is not in any folders.
Throws:
com.percussion.webservices.PSErrorException
com.percussion.extension.PSExtensionProcessingException
com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException

getParentFolderPath

@IPSJexlMethod(description="get the folder path for this item",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="assemblyItem",description="$sys.assemblyItem"),
               returns="the path of the folder that contains this item")
public String getParentFolderPath(com.percussion.services.assembly.IPSAssemblyItem assemblyItem)
                           throws com.percussion.webservices.PSErrorResultsException,
                                  com.percussion.extension.PSExtensionProcessingException,
                                  com.percussion.webservices.PSErrorException,
                                  com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Gets the path of a folder containing this item.

Parameters:
assemblyItem - the assembly item whose parent folder will be fetched.
Returns:
the folder path of the containing folder.
Throws:
com.percussion.webservices.PSErrorResultsException
com.percussion.extension.PSExtensionProcessingException

getParentFolderPaths

@IPSJexlMethod(description="get the folder path for this item",
               params=@IPSJexlParam(name="itemId",description="the item GUID"))
public List<String> getParentFolderPaths(com.percussion.utils.guid.IPSGuid guid)
                                  throws com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
Get the folder paths for an item.

Parameters:
itemId - the GUID for the item
Returns:
the parent folder path. If there are multiple paths, the first one will be returned. Will be return empty list if the item is not in any folders.
Throws:
com.percussion.cms.PSCmsException
